entries.name: Age
entries: The Night God grants you long life. His followers mature at the same rate as humans but can live to be 200 years old.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Nagbloed have turned their back on the Sun Goddess, but they still follow the Night Godâ€™s precepts. They tend to be lawful. However, their lust for power draws them towards Evil.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

entries.name: Walk in Shadows
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Stealth} skill.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, Sanguis and Abyssal.

entries.name: Superior Darkvision
entries: Accustomed to life underground, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Armor Training
entries: You have proficiency with light and medium armor.

entries.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

entries.name: Slithering Shadow
entries: Your movement speed increases to 35 feet.

entries.name: Assassin Training
entries: You have proficiency with the {@item dagger|phb}, {@item rapier|phb}, {@item shortbow|phb}, and {@item longbow|phb}.

entries.name: Dark Knowledge
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Arcana} skill.

entries.name: Dark Resistance
entries: You have resistance against necrotic damage.
